plot: His Holiness the Dali Lama blesses compassionate children. Children relate their stories of compassion and how meeting His Holiness the Dali Lama has affected their life.
title: We Can Change the World
plot_es: His Holiness the Dali Lama blesses compassionate children. Children relate their stories of compassion and how meeting His Holiness the Dali Lama has affected their life.
plot_en: His Holiness the Dali Lama blesses compassionate children. Children relate their stories of compassion and how meeting His Holiness the Dali Lama has affected their life.
